Vue: this.$route.path.description:
Route Object Properties:
A string that equals the path of the current route, always resolved as an absolute path.

Vue: this.$route.params.description:
Route Object Properties:
An object that contains key/value pairs of dynamic segments and star segments. If there are no params the value will be an empty object.

Vue: this.$route.query.description:
Route Object Properties:
An object that contains key/value pairs of the query string.

Vue: this.$route.meta.description:
Route Object Properties:
An object that contains key/value pairs of the route meta object. If there are no meta properties the value will be an empty object.

Vue: this.$route.hash.description:
Route Object Properties:
The hash of the current route (with the #), if it has one. If no hash is present the value will be an empty string.

Vue: this.$route.fullPath.description:
Route Object Properties:
The full resolved URL including query and hash.

Vue: this.$route.matched.description:
Route Object Properties:
An Array containing route records for all nested path segments of the current route.

Vue: this.$route.name.description:
Route Object Properties:
The name of the current route, if it has one.

Vue: this.$route.redirectedFrom.description:
Route Object Properties:
The name of the route being redirected from, if there were one.
